https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/o9PzjQheqgA72pDtsmg8VGYDz7u.jpg Yussuf and Aliosha are two shipwrecked sailors on an island in the Caspian Sea. They start working as sailor and mechanic for the fishing boats of the "Lights of the Communism" kolkhoz. Here the two friends will fall in love with the beautiful Masha. By the Bluest of Seas
